basics.name: Victor Hoang
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2025.

work.summary: Mobile App Developer for Real Estate Application
highlights: Developed and maintained a real estate web app using React Native for seamless cross-platform functionality.
Integrated FastAPI with Prisma ORM for efficient data handling and PostgreSQL for robust database management.
Implemented Firebase authentication to ensure secure and reliable user access.

work.summary: Analyzed data and supported technical issues.
highlights: Analyzed large datasets to identify trends, anomalies, and actionable insights, improving data accuracy for credit reporting.
Designed and maintained interactive dashboards and reports using data visualization tools, enhancing data accessibility for stakeholders.
Performed data cleaning, validation, and transformation to improve the quality and reliability of business intelligence.
Collaborated with engineering and business teams to troubleshoot and resolve software, hardware, and networking issues, ensuring seamless data operations.
Assisted in automating data collection and reporting processes, reducing manual workload and increasing efficiency.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Recognition for students who have achieved a semester GPA of 3.5 or higher.

awards.title: Second place
awards.summary: My team won second place in 2024 (UHSpaceDataHub).  See my portfolio site for more details.
